resources.string: \'Gain Factor\' is a metric that helps you examine and compare the inherent body-building qualities of foods.
Unlike nutritional labels, the Gain Factor allows direct numerical comparisons irrespective of serving sizes.
To assess the Gain Factor of a given food, you will need to record the calories, serving size and protein quantity.

Additionally, if you know the cost of the product and the total quantity, the \'Gain Value\' metric gives you a direct measure to compare the value of diverse food in regards to cost and energy density.
Ultimately, we provide you with the ability to maximize your energy intake, whether that\'s through high energy-dense food, or through the strategic purchasing of high value foods.
